item.title: WP to Buffer (Twitter Sharing) – WordPress Plugins
item.description: “WP to Buffer is a plugin for WordPress that sends updates to your Buffer (bufferapp.com) account for scheduled publishing to social networks when you publish and/or update WordPress Pages, Posts and/or Custom Post Types.” — Now I like Buffer a lot … I use it mostly via Twitter to ‘Buffer’ my tweets at different times of the day. If you don’t already have a plugin to send your scheduled posts to Twitter then here’s a plugin to try that will send them to your Buffer queue.
